hero.title: Atia AB
hero.subtitle: Mobile App Development & AI Specialists
hero.description: We craft intelligent mobile applications that harness the power of AI. Our expertise spans from frontend mobile development to robust Linux-based backend infrastructure.
hero.description2: Whether you need a cutting-edge mobile app, AI integration, or scalable backend systems, we deliver complete solutions from concept to deployment.

about.title: About Atia AB
about.description: At Atia AB, we are mobile app development specialists with deep expertise in artificial intelligence and Linux systems. We build intelligent mobile applications backed by robust, scalable infrastructure that can handle enterprise-level demands.

app_dev.title: Mobile Development
app_dev.description: Native and cross-platform mobile apps built with cutting-edge frameworks and AI integration.

ai_solutions.title: AI Integration
ai_solutions.description: Machine learning models and AI capabilities seamlessly integrated into mobile applications.

open_source.title: Linux Expertise
open_source.description: Deep Linux knowledge for server management, containerization, and infrastructure automation.

linux_systems.title: Backend Infrastructure
linux_systems.description: Scalable backend systems, APIs, and cloud infrastructure built on Linux foundations.

services.title: Our Core Services
services.description: We specialize in creating intelligent mobile applications powered by AI, built on rock-solid Linux infrastructure. From concept to deployment, we handle the complete technology stack.

mobile_apps.title: AI-Powered Mobile Apps
mobile_apps.description: Native iOS and Android applications with integrated machine learning capabilities. We build intelligent apps that learn from user behavior and provide personalized experiences.

web_apps.title: Backend API Development
web_apps.description: Robust, scalable APIs built with modern frameworks. Our backend services handle everything from user authentication to real-time data processing and AI model inference.

ai_powered.title: Machine Learning Integration
ai_powered.description: Custom AI models tailored to your specific needs. We implement everything from recommendation engines to computer vision and natural language processing within your mobile apps.

backend.title: Linux Infrastructure
backend.description: Enterprise-grade Linux servers, containerization with Docker and Kubernetes, and automated deployment pipelines. We ensure your apps run reliably at scale.

open_source_solutions.title: Cloud Architecture
open_source_solutions.description: Modern cloud-native architectures using AWS, Google Cloud, or Azure. We design systems that are resilient, scalable, and cost-effective.

managed_ops.title: DevOps & Monitoring
managed_ops.description: Complete DevOps solutions including monitoring, logging, automated backups, and security management. We ensure your systems are always running optimally.

pricing.title: Enterprise-Grade Solutions, Transparent Pricing
pricing.description: We deliver professional mobile apps with AI capabilities and robust backend infrastructure. Our pricing reflects the enterprise-grade quality and ongoing support you receive.

simple.title: Mobile App Development
simple.description: Complete mobile app with backend API and basic AI features

ai.title: AI-Powered Solutions
ai.description: Advanced mobile apps with custom ML models and intelligent features

nonprofit.title: Enterprise Infrastructure
nonprofit.description: Full-scale Linux infrastructure, DevOps pipelines, and 24/7 monitoring for mission-critical applications.

portfolio.title: Featured Projects
portfolio.description: Explore our latest mobile applications featuring AI integration, robust backend systems, and scalable Linux infrastructure.

cafe.title: Smart Inventory Mobile App
cafe.description: A React Native mobile application with AI-powered demand forecasting for retail inventory management. Features real-time synchronization across multiple locations, predictive analytics using TensorFlow Lite, and a Node.js backend running on Linux servers with Docker containerization.

yoga.title: AI-Powered Scheduling Platform
yoga.description: iOS and Android native applications with machine learning algorithms for optimal resource scheduling. Built with Swift/Kotlin, featuring computer vision for capacity management, and a Python/Django backend with Redis caching on Ubuntu servers.

cleaning.title: Route Optimization Mobile Suite
cleaning.description: Cross-platform mobile application using Flutter with integrated Google Maps API and custom route optimization algorithms. Features real-time GPS tracking, PostgreSQL database, and microservices architecture deployed on Kubernetes clusters.

electrician.title: Emergency Dispatch System
electrician.description: Real-time mobile application built with React Native and WebSocket connections for instant communication. Features AI-powered priority queuing, MongoDB for data persistence, and high-availability Linux infrastructure with automated failover.

fitness.title: Personal Fitness AI App
fitness.description: Native mobile app with integrated ML models for personalized workout recommendations. Built using SwiftUI and Jetpack Compose, with custom-trained neural networks running on GPU-accelerated Linux servers.

dental.title: Healthcare Management Platform
dental.description: HIPAA-compliant mobile application with end-to-end encryption for patient data. Features biometric authentication, offline synchronization, and a secure API gateway deployed on hardened Linux systems with automated security updates.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: Ready to start your next project? Let's discuss how we can help you achieve your technology goals.
